SEARCH
Module io.jstach.ezkv.kvs
Package io.jstach.ezkv.kvs

Interface KeyValue.Meta

Enclosing class:
KeyValue
public static sealed interface KeyValue.Meta
Metadata associated with a KeyValue. This interface encapsulates additional information about a key-value pair, such as its raw, unexpanded value, its source, and any flags that modify its behavior.

Components:

  • raw() - The original, unexpanded value associated with the key.
  • source() - The source of the key-value, represented by a KeyValue.Source.
  • flags() - A set of KeyValue.Flag that can modify how the key-value is processed.

Immutability:

Implementations of Meta are immutable, ensuring that once created, the metadata cannot be altered. However, methods are provided to create modified copies with updated flags or source information.

  • Method Details

    • originalKey

      String originalKey()
      The original key that was collected on the source.
      Returns:
      the original key.

    • raw

      String raw()
      Retrieves the raw, unexpanded value associated with the KeyValue.
      Returns:
      the original raw value as a String.

    • source

      KeyValue.Source source()
      Returns the source from which the key-value pair was loaded.
      Returns:
      a KeyValue.Source representing the origin of the key-value.

    • flags

      Set<KeyValue.Flag> flags()
      Retrieves any flags associated with the key-value. These flags can alter how the key-value is interpreted or displayed.
      Returns:
      a Set of KeyValue.Flag representing the flags.

    • withFlags

      KeyValue.Meta withFlags(Collection<KeyValue.Flag> flags)
      Creates a new Meta instance with the specified flags.
      Parameters:
      flags - the collection of flags to include in the new metadata.
      Returns:
      a new Meta instance with the updated flags.

    • withSource

      KeyValue.Meta withSource(KeyValue.Source source)
      Creates a new Meta instance with the specified source.
      Parameters:
      source - the new source to associate with the metadata.
      Returns:
      a new Meta instance with the updated source.

    • of

      static KeyValue.Meta of(String originalKey, String raw, KeyValue.Source source, Set<KeyValue.Flag> flags)
      Factory method to create a new Meta instance with the specified raw value, source, and flags.
      Parameters:
      originalKey - original key.
      raw - the raw value associated with the key-value.
      source - the source from which the key-value was loaded.
      flags - the flags associated with the key-value.
      Returns:
      a new Meta instance.
